name: cycletoronto_apisproject_seantrudel
description: "Cycle Toronto" activity web app using City of Toronto's bicycle-related APIs. Purpose: Provide outdoor activity ideas for people who feel the need to get out and cycle. Description: The cyclist can use this app to plan their nest trip by being informed on Toronto's upcoming public holidays, where to park their bikes, and suggested city bikeways.
author: Sean Trudel
